```{r setup, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("ggfittext")
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# manually making the data frame, haha
d26_data <- data.frame(
  x_coord = c(1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3),
  y_coord = c(1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3),
  building = c("Biomedical Sciences\nand Physics", "Yablokoff-Wallace\nDining Center", "Administration", "Leo and Dottie\nKolligian Library", "Arts and\nComputational Sciences", "Science and\nEngineering 1", "Sustainability Research\nand Engineering", "Classroom and\nOffices 1", "Social Science\nand Management")
)
```

```{r}
# baseplot
d26_data |>
  # filter(building %in% c("Biomedical Sciences\nand Physics", "Yablokoff-Wallace\nDining Center", "Administration", "Leo and Dottie\nKolligian Library", "Arts and\nComputational Sciences", "Science and\nEngineering 1", "Sustainability Research\nand Engineering", "Classroom and\nOffices 1", "Social Science\nand Management")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x_coord, y = y_coord, label = building)) +
  geom_tile(fill = "#FFBF3C", color = "#002856") + #UC Merced brand colors
  ggfittext::geom_fit_text(color = "#002856", grow = TRUE) +
  labs(title = "UC Merced",
       subtitle = "Hide-and-Seek",
       caption = "Moves may be up, down, left,\nor right (not diagonally)",
       x = "",
       y = "") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#002856"),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(color = "#DAA900", face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5, size = 30),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "#F18A00", face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5, size = 25),
        plot.caption = element_text(color = "#64A43A", face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5, size = 20))
```
